term.title: block macromolecule

item.text: A macromolecule which is composed of blocks in linear sequence.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2287. 'Glossary of basic terms in polymer science (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2292 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122287)
